changes: Added image url caching and added sorting of the apps list.

Quest RPC is now Quest Presence. That and much more like app icons in your presence or an improved home screen layout with optimizations under the hood for improving app stop detection can you find in version 2.0. Out now.

Fixed an issue, where the name of the game was not quite right 

Added an new update notification 

New Category of unknown apps

Fixed a few more smaller issues

The App is now on SideQuest. I can recommend you installing it through that website, as it is much simpler. I'm also happy if you would leave a review :D.

But, of course, there are also other improvements:
Now there should be (nearly) no 2D apps in the installed Apps overview
The names of the games are now fetched through the internet, so that you don't need to change many names
